Models¶

class user.models.User(*args, **kwargs)¶

Custom user model.

E-mail is an unique identificator.

Parameters:

  • id (BigAutoField) – Primary key: ID

  • password (CharField) – Пароль

  • last_login (DateTimeField) – Последний вход

  • first_name (CharField) – Имя

  • last_name (CharField) – Фамилия

  • email (EmailField) – E-mail

  • is_active (BooleanField) – Активный

  • is_staff (BooleanField) – Администрация

  • is_superuser (BooleanField) – Superuser

Relationship fields:

Parameters:

  • groups (ManyToManyField to Group) – Группы. Группы, к которым принадлежит данный пользователь. Пользователь получит все права, указанные в каждой из его/её групп. (related name: user_set)

  • user_permissions (ManyToManyField to Permission) – Права пользователя. Индивидуальные права данного пользователя. (related name: user_set)

Reverse relationships:

Parameters:

  • logentry (Reverse ForeignKey from LogEntry) – All записи в журнале of this user (related name of user)

  • product (Reverse ForeignKey from Product) – All products of this user (related name of owner)

  • cart (Reverse ForeignKey from Cart) – All carts of this user (related name of user)

  • order (Reverse ForeignKey from Order) – All orders of this user (related name of user)

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
REQUIRED_FIELDS = ['first_name', 'last_name']¶
USERNAME_FIELD = 'email'¶

Type: Reverse ForeignKey from Cart

class user.models.UserManager(*args, **kwargs)¶

Custom user manager with email as the unique identifier.

create_superuser(email, password=None, **extra_fields)¶

Creates and saves a superuser with given email and password.

Args:

email (str): E-mail address.

password (str, optional): Password. Defaults to None.

Returns:

User: a new User instance with given email and password and superuser privileges.

create_user(email, password=None, **extra_fields)¶

Creates and saves a User with given email and password.

Args:

email (str): E-mail address.

password (str, optional): Password. Defaults to None.

Returns:

User: a new User instance with given email and password.
